resources.string: Unfortunately we don\'t have travelers. \n Please add one by clicking "Add traveler" button
Make sure you enter all trips that can be included in the calculation (i.e. approximately last year)
There are no trips for %1$s. \n Please add trips by clicking \"Add new trip\" button
To calculate the amount of days %1$s still can spend in a Schengen Area, please press calculation button
